Name: Portrait of a White-haired Man
Description: This portrait shows a white-haired man who is dressed in a white robe with a purple band. He has a white beard and is going bald on top, while on either side the hair is white. He appears to have somewhat long ears; his eyebrows are blackish; his brown eyes have black pupils and a sad expression. The style of painting dates this portrait to the second century A.D.
